name: Starcrossed (itch) (powerchu)
description:
Be absolutely dazzled by the expanse of the space as you chart across the galaxy to light up various Constellations of the universe. This is a poetic experiential game where you learn about the fables of famous constellations' mythologies.

An innovative, unique game mechanic, in a world full of life, what's not to love?
----------------
Starcrossed was developed by a highly motivated and passionate team of three - 1 designer and 2 programmers - in Unity Engine.

Producer, Gameplay Programmer & UI/UX Programmer: Aaron Chu

Level Designer, Enemy and Player Design, & Narrative: Sean Tan

Level Designer, Technical Programmer, Tools & Narrative: Shannon Tan
